def insertion_sort(arr):
    """ Insertion Sort
        Complexity: O(n^2)
    """
    for i in xrange(len(arr)):
        cursor = arr[i]
        pos = i
        while pos > 0 and arr[pos-1] > cursor:
            
            arr[pos] = arr[pos-1]
            pos = pos-1
        
        arr[pos] = cursor
    return arr
comments: insertion sort         complexity  o(n 2)            swap number list    break final swap
content:
def insertion_sort(arr):
    """ Insertion Sort
        Complexity: O(n^2)
    """
    for i in xrange(len(arr)):
        cursor = arr[i]
        pos = i
        while pos > 0 and arr[pos-1] > cursor:
            # Swap the number down the list
            arr[pos] = arr[pos-1]
            pos = pos-1
        # Break and do the final swap
        arr[pos] = cursor
    return arr
